pl.hubertkarbowy.ExamsAdmin

Class BetterTableModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel
        • pl.hubertkarbowy.ExamsAdmin.BetterTableModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel

    abstract class BetterTableModel
extends javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel
    Provides additional functionality for the DefaultTableModel. Some methods are overwritten and some are added for better handling of automatic table refreshing.
